Welcome to Mixer¶

Welcome to Mixer’s documentation.

Mixer is a python module that adds object generation tool for testing your application. It’s supported Django ORM or SQLAlchemy (Flask) models. It’s useful for testing or fixtures replacement.

copyright:2013 by Kirill Klenov.
license:BSD, see LICENSE for more details.

Bug tracker¶

If you have any suggestions, bug reports or annoyances please report them to the issue tracker at https://github.com/klen/Flask-Mixer/issues

Contributing¶

Development of flask-mixer happens at github: https://github.com/klen/Flask-Mixer
